ConfigurationChange.changeReason: header : name : updated fields : name : added, Value : added, Name : updated
fields : status : added, Status : updated, Type : added, Value : deleted, Name : deleted

ConfigurationTable.description: Configurable options to tune Stream performance
ConfigurationTable.name: PersistenceProviderCustomSettings

ConfigurationTable.description: Configurable options to tune Stream performance
ConfigurationTable.name: PersistenceProviderCustomSettings

ConfigurationTable.description: Configurable options to tune Data Table performance
ConfigurationTable.name: PersistenceProviderCustomSettings

Thing.description: Hosts all services for this connector.
Thing.name: ConnectorHost

FieldDefinition.description: User context in which to run event handlers
FieldDefinition.name: runAsUser

PropertyDefinition.description: The name of the stream that the getData service will attempt to copy
PropertyDefinition.name: dataStreamToCopy

PropertyDefinition.description: The name of the data table that the getData service will attempt to copy
PropertyDefinition.name: dataTableToCopy

PropertyDefinition.description: Any tags older than this amount of days will be removed by the purgeDataStreams service
PropertyDefinition.name: daysToKeep

PropertyDefinition.description: Data that is not historically logged and lacks a hyphen for organisation will be put in here. NOTE: these still will be seperated by ewon. EX: my_Ewon-GeneralDataTable
PropertyDefinition.name: generalDataTableName

PropertyDefinition.description: true indicates that stream data items will be organised into various streams depending on how the data item's name is formatted with regards to a hyphen.
PropertyDefinition.name: useHyphensDataTables

ServiceDefinition.description: Landing function that an ewon can connect to
ServiceDefinition.name: TakeInfo

ServiceDefinition.description: Grabs all historical data from the DataMailbox then cleans all of the recieved data from data mailbox
ServiceDefinition.name: Talk2MSyncData

ResultType.description: returns usedTransactionId which is the most recent TransactionId actually processed and ready for deletion and nextTransactionId, the next transaction id to be called.
ResultType.name: result

ServiceDefinition.description: Sets a Ewon to offline or online depended on if it was online or offline to begin with
ServiceDefinition.name: Talk2MTurnOnOrOff

ConfigurationChange.changeReason: services : MainExecution : service updated subscriptions : runConnector : enabled updated
